::Shadow Wing::

She was looking through the connects, when she found one connection 
that she had over looked.  She hooked up to the connection.  The 
protoform started shaking on the table.  The optics flickered and 
changed color.  Shadow Wing had finally found the connection that 
made her apart of the form.  Her spark was taking control of the 
form.  She started to feel the body of the form and felt away of it's 
surroundings.  The form stopped moving and lay still.  The form went 
into a suspended animation mode.  Shadow Wing awoke, but the form was 
alseep.  She thought that she had to do something to communicate with 
Veratis.  Then she felt him, is thoughts.  She could hear his 
thoughts. She was scared but at the same time facinated by this.  She 
thought to him,"Hey, can you hear me? I can hear you, kind of. What's 
going on? What happened?"
